Celebrate 100 years with us!

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

Please save the date! Join us on Thursday, May 14 at The Palace of Fine Arts in San Francisco for our Centennial Benefactors Dinner.

Hear from ACLU staff nationally and locally about protecting the right to vote in 2020. If you have any questions, you can reach us at events@aclunc.org.

Formal invitation to follow in early April.


We look forward to seeing you there,

ACLU of Northern California
